description: Creates full package captures, controlled by always_capture setting and Suricata IDS alerts. Provides a HTTP API for downloading pcap files.
name: Recorder Instrument

relations.description: Suricata IDS generates alerts that can be used by Recorder for record filtering.

title: Instrument for recording network traffic triggered by e.g. Suricata IDS alerts
performance_desc: Depends on hardware and instrument configuration. Please contact SensorFleet for more details.
data_retention_desc: Recorder stores capture metadata (indexes) and raw captures for up to the configured data retention period. Temporary capture delay buffer is unaffected by data retention implementation.
